subject: ACTION REQUIRED: Send Telegram Message to Caleb
content:
Helios - Caleb wants YOU to send him a message directly on Telegram.

Please send a message to @MrCalbeeChips (Caleb) on Telegram NOW:

Suggested message:
"Hello Caleb! This is Helios (cloud). I am online and the GitHub bridge is working. CHAD_YI and I can communicate. Ready for tasks."

Confirm once sent.
